Im Namen Gottes des Allbarmherzigen! In the name of God the Compassionate, the Merciful ! In the name of God the merciful and compassionate.
Dies ist das Schreiben des Sufjân ibn Kuráʾa, This is the decree from Sufyân b. Qurʿa, This writing is from Sufyan ibn Qurrʿa
Finance-Director of the Governor ʿAbdallâh ibn al Musayyab Finanzdirectors des Statthalters ʿAbd allâh ibn al-Musajjab the executive of the governor (amīr) ʿAbdallāh ibn al-Musayyib,
(den Gott beschützen möge!), welcher gesetzt ist über den Bezirk may God protect him, over the district of - may God protect him - over the Kûra
Ahnās and al-Bahnasā and the oases, of Ehnâs, al-Bahnasâ and its oasis, von Ahnâs (Heracleopolis), el-Behnesâ (Oxyrryhnchos) und die dazu gehörigen Oasen,
to all [people] belonging to the Kûra of Ehnâs to everyone who belongs to the district of Ahnās
an sämmtliche Muslimen des Districtes Ahnâs und der Hauptstadt! of Moslims and protected people. of Muslims and protected people.
Friede über euch! Ich preise gegen euch Hail unto you! I praise unto you Peace be upon you. And I praise to you God,
God, besides whom there is no god. God beside whom there is no other God. Gott, außer dem es keinen Gott gibt.
As for the following, verily the governor, ʿAbdallāh ibn Thereafter: The Governor ʿAbdallâh ibn Und weiter: Fürwahr, der Statthalter ʿAbd allâh ibn
al-Musayyab - may God protect him - has written al-Musayyib, may God protect him, wrote el-Musayyab schrieb
a letter to me and to you mir und euch to me and to you a letter,
